snippet: Acquaintances of Tamerlan Tsarnaev in Russia said he was already interested in waging jihad when he arrived there last year, but they discouraged him from joining a militant group.
abstract: Accounts from Kizlyar, Russia, are filling out picture of how Tamerlan Tsarnaev spent six months in Russia in 2012; acquaintances say Tsarnaev arrived already intent on waging jihad and that they tried to discourage him from doing so.
lead_paragraph: Acquaintances of Tamerlan Tsarnaev in Russia said he was already interested in waging jihad when he arrived there last year, but they discouraged him from joining a militant group.

headline.seo: In Russia, Marathon Bombing Suspect Talked Jihad
headline.main: Suspect in Boston Bombing Talked Jihad in Russia
headline.print_headline: Marathon Bomb Suspect Talked Jihad in Russia
